IndexPage.title: Wedding App - Home Page
IndexPage.description: ¬°Bienvenidos al ejemplo de Next.js Internationalization (i18n)! Esta demo muestra la potencia del App Router y c√≥mo gestionar contenido multiling√ºe sin problemas utilizando next-intl

sections.locationsText1: We therefore have the pleasure to invite you to our wedding ceremony.
sections.locations1: Choose the perfect venue that captures the essence of your love story.
sections.grettingText: There are days in life that are special on their own. Sharing them with the people you love makes them unforgettable.
sections.galleryText: Each photo tells a part of our story, from the simplest moments to the most extraordinary. We feel fortunate to have shared so many memories together and are excited to create many more in the future.
sections.subtitle: Confirm Your Assistance
sections.title: WE HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE
sections.descriptionForm: Fill the form below to confirm your assistance to the wedding.

gifts.message: Your presence is the best gift, but if you still want to help us:

form.warning: We hope to see you at our wedding. You will receive an email with the wedding details, please check the

BusServiceRadioButton.label: Will you use the bus service?

guestsNamesInput.label: Accompanying person's name
guestsNamesInput.placeholder: Enter the name of your accompanying person

guestsChildrenNamesInput.label: Children Names
guestsChildrenNamesInput.placeholder: Enter the names of your children

allergiesInput.label: Provide a list of Allergies
allergiesInput.placeholder: Enter your allergies separated by commas

menuChoiceRadioButton.label: Do you prefer meat or fish?

commentsInput.label: Additional Comments
commentsInput.placeholder: Feel free to add any additional comments that you would like to be considered

form.confirmationMessage: We look forward to seeing you at our wedding. You will receive an email with the wedding details. Please check your SPAM folder.
form.cannotAttendMessage: We are sorry you can't make it. You will receive an email with the wedding details. Please check your SPAM folder, which you can ignore.

example.title: Example of internationalization
example.description: This is an example of how you can manage multilingual content in Next.js using next-intl. You can change the language in the navigation bar.
